p: However, available data on effective herbal medicine for infected cases with SARS-CoV-2 were inadequate, and hence further studies are required [ 36]. In this review, other Chinese medicinal plants can be found in Table 1 [ 35, 37, 38] and herbal plants public beliefs are figured out in Table 2, among all kinds of herbal plants in the world. Table 3 shows some additional herbal drugs which are used for immunity booster all over the world properly by various communities.
